Words cannot express how grateful we are for the way Dr Hoe has been handling my mom's condition since 9 years ago until now.  The first time I saw him, I knew that with his skillful experience and warmth care and understanding, my mom was with a perfect doctor.  Indeed it was the truth. Thank you God, Dr Hoe and Team for everything.

I like Dr. Hoe very much. He is a very kind doctor. I could tell he works long hours from his eyes but he still could check on me in the hospital ward on a Saturday late night to make sure I was well taken care of. He explained my diagnosis/treatment patiently to me during every consultation.  My surgery went well, the stitches he did for me were perfect. He is my guardian angel.
I've been going to Dr Hoe for a few years now. He is extremely patient and very detailed. He takes his time to check and explain everything to you clearly and slowly. A good and caring doctor!
